name: Abyss (itch) (ZaffreSheep)
description:
Survive as long as you can while you are chased by an abyss. Waves of hazards move towards you and you have to hit a corresponding arrow key, shown above each hazard, just before they hit you. If you hit the wrong key, there's no going back.

With each hit you take, you get closer and closer to being swallowed by the abyss.

Controls:

Up and Down Arrow Keys, or the W and S keys

Escape to close the game from the menu

Post-Jam:

Post Mini Jam 18, I hope to make an Android version. I think it'd be a pretty enjoyable game to play on the go and it wouldn't take me terribly long to figure that out.

Thanks for checking this out and have fun!
